dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: glm
dependencies.description:
OpenGL Mathematics (GLM) is a header only C++ mathematics library for
graphics software based on the OpenGL Shading Language (GLSL)
specification

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries

dependencies.name: freetype
dependencies.description:
FreeType is a freely available software library to render fonts. It is
written in C, designed to be small, efficient, highly customizable, and
portable while capable of producing high-quality output (glyph images)
of most vector and bitmap font formats.

dependencies.name: pcre
dependencies.description:
The PCRE package contains Perl Compatible Regular Expression libraries.
These are useful for implementing regular expression pattern matching
using the same syntax and semantics as Perl 5.

dependencies.name: boost
dependencies.description:
Boost provides free peer-reviewed portable C++ source libraries,
emphasizing libraries that work well with the C++ Standard Library.
Boost libraries are intended to be widely useful, and usable across a
broad spectrum of applications. The Boost license encourages both
commercial and non-commercial use.

dependencies.name: jpeg
dependencies.description:
libjpeg is a widely used free library with functions for handling the
JPEG image data format. It implements a JPEG codec (encoding and
decoding) alongside various utilities for handling JPEG data.

dependencies.name: libpng
dependencies.description: libpng is the official PNG reference library.

dependencies.name: sdl2
dependencies.description:
Simple DirectMedia Layer is a cross-platform development library
designed to provide low level access to audio, keyboard, mouse,
joystick, and graphics hardware via OpenGL and Direct3D.

dependencies.name: sdl2-image
dependencies.description:
SDL is designed to provide the bare bones of creating a graphical
program.
